--- Pacifix ---

Pacifix nods to Artemis, "Ok." He leaps over the rubble on top of 
Arty, and starts running towards Grimlock. <<I've got to stop 
Grimlock."



On 5 Jun 2001, at 4:21, airly2000@... wrote:

> Artemis::
> 
> Artemis said to her leader "Pacifix I'll go to help JetV"
> 
> The femme transformed in vehicle mode and followed Jetv
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., Jordan Guthrie <gunthers8@n...> wrote:
> > ::Slag/Repugnus::
> > Slag looked to JetV as he yelled out. "Shut yer mouth.  I should 
> come 
> > there and teach lesson." he then turned and blasted a flame at same 
> bot 
> > he had been shotting for the whole battle.
> > 
> > Repugnus stood dumbfounded as the sword talked to the drunk bot.
> > "What the hell?" he said looking at the drunk.
> > 
> > OOC: yea you had better change it, jeez.
> > 
> > gunthers8@n... wrote:
> > 
> > > ::JetV::
> > > JetV saw SwitchBlade fall to the ground.  He saw everything in 
> slow
> > > motion it seemed.  The bot hitting the ground and the debris 
> spearing
> > > him. "What have i done. I killed him." He floated back to the 
> ground and
> > > looked to the bot.
> > > "Why...why did i do it. I didn't know who he was or what he 
> wanted, i
> > > jsut attacked. I didn't have to, shouldn't have. I...I...didn't 
> act like
> > > an Autobot.
> > > NONE OF US ARE." he began screaming."STOP, THIS IS NOT AUTOBOT 
> WAYS. DO
> > > WE EVEN KNOW WHO THESE PEOPLE ARE. PACIFIX STOP THEM." he then 
> looked to
> > > the stasis locked Switchblade. He ran and picked him up and began
> > > running for the ship and it's small CR.
> > >
